name: write-group-request
description: Represents a request to write a group of values to a set of BACnet group channels, with optional priority and delay.

fields.name: group-number
fields.description: The group number identifying the set of channels to write.

fields.name: write-priority
fields.description: The priority to use for the write operation.

fields.name: change-list
fields.description: A list of values to be written to the group channels.

fields.name: inhibit-delay
fields.description: If true, delays the write operation. Optional.
